text: Anatoly Grigoriyevich Brovko (; born 22 August 1966) is a Russian politician who served as the Governor of Volgograd Oblast. Brovko was born in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, Ukrainian SSR. In February 2009, Brovko was included in the list of the "First 100" of the High-Potential Management Personnel Reserve, a program announced by Russian President Dmitry Medvedev on 23 July 2008. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dnipropetrovsk Oblast Category:United Russia politicians Category:21st-century Russian politicians Category:Governors of Volgograd Oblast
title: Anatoly Brovko
